adHeader: Business Plans for Bay Area Ventures
adDetails: Business Plans for Bay Area Ventures At FarSun Communications, we specialize in developing innovative business plans to attract lenders and investors including financial projections, interactive chats, maps and slide show presentations that not only satisfy investor and lender requirements, but also may be used to track and dynamically chart current costs vs. sales. Your custom interactive model will also provide you with an effective means of testing and assessing the impact of various pricing and cost scenarios to optimize profitability. If you are an entrepreneur, we share the same dreams and speak the same language. Tech startup ventures are especially welcome. For more information and samples: http://www.farsun.com/businessplans.htm (If I am with a client, please leave a message and I will promptly return your call.) Ron S. Nolan, Ph.D. Far Sun Communication Services Aptos, CA 95003. show contact info www.farsun.com show contact info
